mapper.select: SELECT booking_id, user_id, site_id, type_id, check_in, check_out, guest_name, guest_phone, total_price, status, create_time, update_time FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}

SELECT booking_id, user_id, site_id, type_id, check_in, check_out, guest_name, guest_phone, total_price, status, create_time, update_time FROM bookings WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT booking_id, user_id, site_id, type_id, check_in, check_out, guest_name, guest_phone, total_price, status, create_time, update_time FROM bookings WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT booking_id, user_id, site_id, type_id, check_in, check_out, guest_name, guest_phone, total_price, status, create_time, update_time FROM bookings WHERE type_id = #{typeId} AND status IN (0, 1) AND NOT (check_out <= #{checkIn} OR check_in >= #{checkOut})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings (user_id, site_id, type_id, check_in, check_out, guest_name, guest_phone, total_price, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{siteId}, #{typeId}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{guestName}, #{guestPhone}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET user_id = #{userId}, site_id = #{siteId}, type_id = #{typeId}, check_in = #{checkIn}, check_out = #{checkOut}, guest_name = #{guestName}, guest_phone = #{guestPhone}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
